attributes.action: Create legislation for Arms Length Management Organisations (ALMOs) to be held accountable to their tenants for properties that  are too small for their tenants needs, for properties that have long term unresolved dampness problems and for properties not to be let with said problems and that do not meet  the Decent Homes Standard. They should also be accountable to their tenants as to why empty properties have not been brought up to the Decent Homes Standard and relet.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tenants need more accountability from their ALMOs and/or social landlords.  Legislation to fastrack long standing repair issues, move tenants to property suiting their needs and enforcing the ALMOs/social landlords to adopt policies that take into account the legal position in this country concerning said issues and not just ignore them by stating "but we don't have enough properties" which in most cases is simply not true.
